name: Mushroom Pizza
description: A gourmet pizza topped with sautéed mushrooms, melted mozzarella, and rich marinara sauce on a perfectly crispy crust, finished with fresh herbs for an earthy, savory taste.
ingredients: sautéed mushrooms, mozzarella, marinara sauce, garlic, parsley, whole wheat flour, olive oil

name: Tomato Bisque
description: A creamy, rich tomato bisque with a hint of basil, served alongside warm garlic bread for the perfect comforting meal.
ingredients: tomatoes, heavy cream, basil, garlic, onion, butter, salt, pepper, garlic bread

name: Grilled Chicken Piccata
description: Juicy grilled chicken served with penne pasta, tossed in a zesty lemon butter sauce with capers and fresh parsley.
ingredients: chicken breast, penne pasta, lemon, butter, capers, garlic, parsley, olive oil, salt, pepper

name: Ahi Tuna Poke Bowl
description: Fresh ahi tuna served with sushi rice, avocado, cucumber, and seaweed, drizzled with a soy-based sauce for a refreshing bite.
ingredients: ahi tuna, avocado, sushi rice, cucumber, seaweed, soy sauce, sesame seeds, scallions

name: Crispy Calamari
description: Golden fried calamari rings served with a tangy marinara dipping sauce, perfect for sharing.
ingredients: calamari, flour, spices, marinara sauce, lemon wedges, salt, pepper, oil for frying

name: Truffle Parmesan Fries
description: Crispy golden fries tossed in truffle oil and topped with a sprinkle of grated Parmesan for an indulgent starter.
ingredients: potatoes, truffle oil, parmesan cheese, salt, parsley

name: Chicken Marsala
description: Succulent chicken breasts simmered in a savory marsala wine sauce with mushrooms, served with mashed potatoes.
ingredients: chicken breast, marsala wine, mushrooms, garlic, chicken broth, cream, parsley, butter

name: Oven-Roasted Salmon
description: Tender, oven-roasted salmon seasoned with fresh herbs, served with a side of seasonal vegetables.
ingredients: salmon fillet, olive oil, rosemary, thyme, garlic, salt, pepper, seasonal vegetables

name: Lobster Tail Dinner
description: Luxurious lobster tail served with melted butter and a side of garlic mashed potatoes.
ingredients: lobster tail, butter, garlic, lemon, parsley, mashed potatoes

name: BBQ Pork Ribs
description: Juicy pork ribs smothered in a smoky BBQ sauce, served with coleslaw and cornbread.
ingredients: pork ribs, BBQ sauce, brown sugar, garlic, spices, cornbread, coleslaw

name: Top Sirloin
description: A perfectly grilled top sirloin steak, served with roasted vegetables and a side of mashed potatoes.
ingredients: top sirloin steak, olive oil, salt, pepper, mashed potatoes, vegetables

name: Coconut Rice Bowl
description: A vibrant rice bowl with a coconut milk base, topped with fresh vegetables and a hint of lime.
ingredients: coconut milk, jasmine rice, bell peppers, carrots, scallions, lime

name: Lentil Bolognese
description: A hearty, plant-based bolognese with lentils, tomatoes, and herbs, served over pasta.
ingredients: lentils, tomatoes, garlic, onion, basil, pasta

name: Tomato Pasta
description: A simple yet flavorful pasta with tomato sauce and fresh basil.
ingredients: pasta, tomatoes, garlic, basil, olive oil, salt, pepper

name: Gluten-Free Pizza
description: A gluten-free pizza topped with a classic marinara sauce, mozzarella, and basil.
ingredients: gluten-free flour, mozzarella, marinara sauce, basil

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A rich chocolate cake with a gooey, molten center, served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: chocolate, butter, eggs, sugar, flour, vanilla ice cream

name: Pecan Pie
description: A sweet, nutty pecan pie with a flaky crust, served with whipped cream.
ingredients: pecans, butter, sugar, eggs, flour, whipped cream

name: Classic Cheesecake
description: A creamy and rich New York-style cheesecake with a buttery graham cracker crust, served with a drizzle of strawberry sauce.
ingredients: cream cheese, graham crackers, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, butter

name: Fountain Drink
description: A refreshing choice of soft drinks including cola, lemon-lime, and root beer, served with ice.
ingredients: carbonated water, high-fructose corn syrup, natural flavors, citric acid

name: Lemonade
description: A refreshing homemade lemonade with a perfect balance of sweetness and tanginess, served over ice.
ingredients: water, lemon juice, sugar, ice

name: Margarita
description: A classic margarita with a mix of tequila, lime juice, and triple sec, served on the rocks with a salted rim.
ingredients: tequila, lime juice, triple sec, salt, ice

name: Strawberry Smoothie
description: A creamy blend of fresh strawberries and banana with a hint of vanilla, perfect for a refreshing treat.
ingredients: strawberries, banana, yogurt, vanilla, ice

name: Red Wine
description: A glass of fine red wine with notes of dark fruit and a smooth finish, perfect for pairing with dinner.
ingredients: grapes
